name: The Text Adventures of the Poorly Drawn Man with No Torso
name_original: The Text Adventures of the Poorly Drawn Man with No Torso
description:
The game is around 30 MB, so you might have to wait a bit.

This is a sequel to my previous game, Adventures of the Poorly Drawn Man with No Torso

I made this game in 4 days on Twine. 4 tiring but fun days.

I think it's pretty cool.

IF YOU LIKE EXPLORING GAMES YOURSELF, STOP READING!

SERIOUSLY, GO PLAY THE GAME!

In The Text Adventures of the Poorly Drawn Man with No Torso, the story has three branches.
Also, there are three character classes that you can choose from.
You should visit all the rooms in the intro section.

These three classes give you some bonus actions here and there.
Some of these actions let you skip the puzzle of the branch altogether, and some of them are just there to be funny.

To discover everything about the game, you have to play it around 10 times or so. 
When you get stuck on a passage with no option to win, there might be a bonus action for another class there, or you might have forgotten to do an action and get something that would be useful in that situation. 

Cheat-y Tip: If you take an unwanted action and don't want to restart from the beginning, just use the Go Back function of your browser. This will take you to the previous passage. But if you do this, expect to see some audio bugs.
